item.description:
Cash game, first-come, first seated, we can accommodate waiting players until a seat opens.

 

Buyin min:  $60  Buyin max:  $300 (or biggest stack @ table)

 

Here's a pic of the poker room!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Game has dedicated dealer, stocked mini-fridge with water & soda, extra mini-fridge if you'd like to BYOB.  Pizza and snacks provided as well.

Just recently upgraded to a 10-seater hold 'em style table with cup holders plus new comfier chairs for the players.  Game could last between 12-2 am.

We have a Bad Beat Jackpot (currently at $140 and qualifier is losing with Jacks full or better) and a Button Bonus (when the game starts whomever gets the button will receive bonus starting cash to play!)  If players are headsup you can run it twice (if both agree).

No smoking inside, but you're welcome to smoke in your car, plenty of off-street parking available.

Please park near the silver Camry and come in via the door on the side deck.  House is on the corner of a four-way intersection, our driveway is near the fire hydrant.  HUGE yard with a small shed and then a larger 3-bay garage/barn further back on the property.

 

note:  I have friends outside of Meetup that will be attending as well, so the RSVP list here won't represent the full number of players  :)

 

My phone is 860-597-3776 if you have any trouble finding us!

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: 1/2 NL Poker Game in East Windsor
